name: Pipe Cleaner
description:
My debut game so please be nice :)

Collect packs of drain cleaner and fling them at the drains at the top of the screen before the animals bite you.

The pipes sit under a nuclear test site so the animals are larger and more deadly than normal - they're not a bit scared of you nor the bottles of drain cleaner and will eat their way through everything. They're on a mission and nothing you can do will stop them.

Your mission is to unblock the pipes on the other side of the river and post the time it took you to do so - advanced players might be able to finish (and compare their speed-runs to others) but only the truly elite will discover just how far your game timer can extend IF you can stay alive that long (hint: you'll need a calendar).

This game is short (it's only one level) but it will still challenge you :)
